name: Sync Facebook Ad Insights to Google Sheets & Slack
description:
Streamline your ad performance analysis by syncing Facebook insights to Google Sheets and discussing them on Slack. Designed for weekly refreshes, this schedule can be adjusted to fit your operational needs, ensuring your marketing team always has the latest data to drive decisions and optimize ad spend effectively.
The scenario is set to execute every Friday. You can change this in the scheduling settings by clicking the clock icon.
